ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: This is a mandatory course for Ph.D students in economics. But it is indeed insightful to those who want to proceed to write Ph.D thesis in economics.
A first year course in game theory and mechanism design.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: This course's game theory knowledge is elementary and very helpful to proceed our research on many economics topics. We often want to build a complex model, in which case we want some useful formula to reduce our burden or get a clue for better modelling. I think what we have learned from this course offers such sort of knowledge.
A lot, I want to do game theory research.
it facilitates my research and make me think about doing micro theory
